basic.title: Support only
basic.description: Perfect for those who already use a chatbot and only need support

pro.title: Development + Support
pro.description: For businesses starting automation: a ready-made solution with support
advantages: Full development of a chatbot tailored to your business
Configuration of logic, scenarios, and integrations

standard.title: Support + Editing
standard.description: For businesses with a bot, ready for large-scale automation
advantages: Maintenance and support of an existing chatbot
Scenario optimization and improving customer interaction

messages.user: Optimize the order process, provide customers with a convenient 24/7 service
messages.bot: A chatbot with bouquet selection, card addition, delivery cost calculation, and online payment:

messages.user: Automate the acceptance of applications, reduce the number of missed calls
messages.bot: Chatbot with a full order scenario: choosing balloons, ordering and planning delivery:

messages.user: Automate application submission, simplify the training process and increase sales
messages.bot: Chatbot with a full scenario: registration, training, sending tasks, reminders and certificates:

implemented.title: How quickly can the product be implemented in your business?
implemented.content:
Ready-made solutions – for standard niches, the bot can be launched in 2–3 days.

Turnaround time: From 48 hours (standard) to 10 days (custom integrations).

Custom setup – if business processes are complex, implementation may take slightly longer, but the result will be precise and effective.

additional.title: Additional functions / Flexible settings
additional.content:
Ready-made solutions – for typical niches, you can launch a bot in 2–3 days.

From 2 to 10 days – depending on the complexity and number of integrations.

Customization – if business processes are complex, implementation will take a little longer, but the result will be accurate and effective.

necessity.content:

sectionIntro.title: Chatbots that make your business <colored>faster</colored> and <colored>smarter</colored>
sectionIntro.desc: Our AI-powered chatbots help businesses streamline customer interactions and automate lead generation — saving time, cutting costs, and boosting productivity.

sectionMarquee.expertise: of expertise in digital marketing and IT

sectionAbout.sectionDesc: We create intelligent solutions that speed up client workflows, bring order to customer requests, and boost sales through automated funnels — tailored to any business niche.

sectionAdvantages.sectionDesc: <semiBold>Chatbots take on routine tasks</semiBold>: communicating with clients, collecting data, answering frequently asked questions, and accepting applications. <semiBold>This saves the team time, reduces the workload, and helps focus on business development.</semiBold>

support.title: Full support
support.subtitle: From idea to launch and support: design, setup, testing, team training.

turnkey.title: Turnkey solutions
turnkey.subtitle: Not just a chatbot, but a ready-made automation system for your processes and goals.

analytics.title: Analytics and Reporting
analytics.subtitle: You receive clear statistics for each stage of the funnel: applications, conversions, engagement.

automatic.title: Automatic Data Collection and Organization
automatic.subtitle: All client data is automatically recorded and categorized.

integration.title: Flexible Integration
integration.subtitle: Connection with CRM systems, payment services, Google Sheets, ad accounts, and other platforms.

structure.title: Modular Structure
structure.subtitle: You can start with basic functionality and gradually expand the bot’s capabilities as your business grows.

sectionTariffs.cta: Pick your perfect plan and launch automation today!

sectionCases.sectionTitle: Businesses that already work with us
sectionCases.sectionDesc: We're at the forefront of innovation, continuously exploring cutting-edge technologies to deliver <semiBold>smart</semiBold> and <semiBold>efficient solutions</semiBold> for our clients.

sectionContacts.sectionTitle: Your first step to smart automation
sectionContacts.sectionDesc: We will help you implement technologies that really work for your results.
